item.title: AlisonChapman on "Best voice recording plugin for Wordpress?"
item.dc:creator: AlisonChapman
item.description: I'm working on a collaborative student website on Scottish Poetry and I want the site to include recordings of poems in Scots and Gaelic. I would like to have some flexibility where the plugin is positioned on the front end. Any advice gratefully received. Alison
